ul.li: Elgin marbles, from the Parthenon at Athens : exemplified by fifty etchings, selected from the most beautiful and least mutilated specimens in that collection : and accompanied with explanatory and critical remarks on the style, composition, and peculiar excellence of those transcendent relics of Grecian sculpture / by Richard Lawrence.

Elgin marbles from the Parthenon at Athens [microform] : exemplified by fifty etchings, selected from the most beautiful and least mutilated specimens in that collection and accompanied with explanatory and critical remarks on the style, composition, and peculiar excellence of those transcendent relics of Grecian sculpture / by Richard Lawrence.
Elgin marbles from the Parthenon at Athens
